Name: quota
Description: Package quota provides access to Linux quota netlink notifications. MIT Licensed.

Name: genetlink
Description: Package genetlink implements generic netlink interactions and data types. MIT Licensed.

Name: devlink
Description: Package devlink provides access to Linux's devlink interface. MIT Licensed.

Name: smbios-rs
Description: Provides detection and access to System Management BIOS (SMBIOS) and Desktop Management Interface (DMI) data and structures. MIT Licensed.

Name: vsock
Description: Package vsock provides access to Linux VM sockets (AF_VSOCK) for communication between a hypervisor and its virtual machines.  MIT Licensed.

Name: wol
Description: Package wol implements a Wake-on-LAN client.  MIT Licensed.

Name: ndp
Description: Package ndp implements the Neighbor Discovery Protocol, as described in RFC 4861.  MIT Licensed.

Name: raw
Description: Package raw enables reading and writing data at the device driver level for a network interface.  MIT Licensed.

Name: kobject
Description: Package kobject provides access to Linux kobject userspace events. MIT Licensed.

Name: wireguardctrl
Description: Package wireguardctrl enables control of WireGuard devices on multiple platforms. MIT Licensed.
